titles.title: A resolution designating April 5, 2014, as "Gold Star Wives Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
4/3/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Designates April 5, 2014, as Gold Star Wives Day.
Honors and recognizes the contributions of the members of the Gold Star Wives of America, Inc., and their dedication to the members and veterans of the Armed Forces.
Encourages the people of the United States to observe Gold Star Wives Day.
